items.name: end-of-the-hedgeworld-dramas
items.title: End of the HedgeWorld dramas.
items.excerpt: After all the drama we've had with HedgeWorld, we've finally come to an end and all the drama is over. All members of HedgeWorld are now welcome at HedgeHeaven! We have unbanned all spies from HedgeWorld and our staff will now be careful not to start dram...
